Naruto performs [[Leaf Whirlwind]] to disable the opponent then sweep them off their feet using [[Leaf Gale]]. After that, he launches the opponent into the sky using [[Rasengan]]. Naruto can only use this technique as "Might Suit" Naruto.

== Trivia ==
* "Aoi" can mean both "blue" and "green" but given that Naruto is wearing the green jumpsuit that [[Guy]] gave him, the word in this instance refers to "green".
* The name refers to two techniques: one a combo in ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 2]]'' and the other an ultimate technique in ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 3]]''.

[[es:Impacto Verde]]
[[pl:Aoi Shōgeki]]
